org.spongepowered.api.statistic.achievement

Interface Achievement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CatalogType, TextRepresentable, Translatable

    public interface Achievement
extends CatalogType, Translatable, TextRepresentable
    Represents an in-game achievement which may be earned by or given to players.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Achievement> getChildren()
      Returns the children of this achievement.
      Translation getDescription()
      Returns the description that describes this achievement.
      Optional<Achievement> getParent()
      Returns the parent of this achievement, if there is one.
      Optional<Statistic> getSourceStatistic()
      Gets the Statistic which this achievement is backed by if it is available.
      Optional<Long> getStatisticTargetValue()

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        Translation getDescription()
        Returns the description that describes this achievement.
        Returns:
        The description of this achievement

      • getParent

        Optional<Achievement> getParent()
        Returns the parent of this achievement, if there is one.
        Returns:
        The parent of this achievement

      • getChildren

        Collection<Achievement> getChildren()
        Returns the children of this achievement.
        Returns:
        An immutable collection of all children this achievement has

      • getSourceStatistic

        Optional<Statistic> getSourceStatistic()
        Gets the Statistic which this achievement is backed by if it is available.
        Returns:
        The source statistic, if available

      • getStatisticTargetValue

        Optional<Long> getStatisticTargetValue()
        If this achievement is backed by a statistic (eg. if getSourceStatistic() is not absent) then this will return the target value which must be reached for this achievement to be awarded to a player.
        Returns:
        The target value, if available
